name: Epoch Wars
summary:
Epoch Wars is a causal RTS game that allows a player to leap right into the action with no need for resource gathering and construction. Players control a battalion of soldiers using a commanding officer to deploy abilities and capture territories. Exciting events in-game will also become a decisive factor for victory.
In addition to the characters the game world will be unique. Consisting of a number of integrated maps of varying complexity, each seems deceptively simple to play.

• Fast paced action strategy game with simplified control system
• Simple but challenging with fun and unique gameplay
• Online multiplayer

• Fast paced action strategy game with simplified control system
- A simplified RTS game that allows players to leap right into the action from game start
- No resource management and no construction required
• Simple but challenging with fun and unique gameplay
- Intuitive rock, paper, and scissors formations for combat resolution
- Unique characters with special abilities
- Extraordinary environment
- 10 single player missions and maps
- 5 purchasable unique single player DLC maps
- Ultimate power boost level-up system for massive destruction
• Online multiplayer
- 1 VS 1, 2 VS 2 Co-op with friends
- Intensive online battle with 4 multiplayer maps
- Downloadable content
